options.description: compute maximal matches that are unique in both sequences
compute maximal matches that are unique in the referencesequence but not necessarily in the query-sequence (default)
compute all maximal matches regardless of their uniqueness
match only the characters a, c, g, or t they can be in upper or in lower case
set the minimum length of a match if not set, the default value is 20
compute forward and reverse complement matches
report the query-position of a reverse complement match relative to the original query sequence
force 4 column output format regardless of the number of reference sequence inputs
show the length of the query sequences on the header line
